product_name: Baffin Buk-Buk Winter Boots - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Built to keep feet comfortable even in extreme cold, the women's Baffin Buk-Buk winter boots offer insulation, waterproof protection and cozy style so you can play or work outside in frigid weather. Windproof, waterproof uppers offer total protection; polyester linings are comfortable next to socks and aid moisture transfer so you don't get clammy, chilled feet. Inner booties with Thermoplush polyester insulation provide warmth and are removable for easy drying. Insulation offers comfort in cold weather down to -40degF. EVA foam midsoles provide a cushioned, contoured fit and insulate feet against the cold ground. Flexible yet durable rubber outsoles allow comfortable walking while providing excellent traction over ice and snow. Closeout.
short_description: Built to keep feet comfortable even in extreme cold, the women's Baffin Buk-Buk winter boots offer insulation, waterproof protection and cozy style so you can play or work outside in frigid weather.
